text: Ergaki (Russian: Ергаки) is a mountain range in the Western Sayan Mountains in southern Siberia, Russia.Ergak-Targak-Taiga / Great Soviet Encyclopedia; in 35 vols. / Ch. ed. Yu. S. Osipov. 2004—2017. The highest point is peak Zvyozdniy (2265 meters). Ergaki Nature Park is a protected area which contains the mountain range.Ergaki Nature Park ==References== == External links == * Category:Mountain ranges of Russia Category:Landforms of Krasnoyarsk Krai
title: Ergaki
